script.name: plugin.patch.cmd.upgradefac.menu
script.description: Patch, Ship Command - Upgrade Factories - Meneu Event Script
script.sourceplaintext:
$page.id = get global variable: name='pageid.patch'
$global.settings = get global variable: name='cmd.upgradefac' if not $global.settings $global.settings = table alloc $global.settings['fave'] = 0 set global variable: name='cmd.upgradefac' value=$global.settings end
if $a.event == [MEvent.Start] $settings = table alloc set global variable: name='cmd.settings' value=$settings gosub sub.BuildSelectMenu return $input else if $a.event == 'single' gosub sub.GetFactory return $input else if $a.event == 'sector' gosub sub.GetSector return $input else if $a.event == 'all' gosub sub.BuildMenu return $input else if $a.event == 'menu.select.upgrade' if $a.data == [TRUE] return [TRUE] end
else if $a.event == [MEvent.Search] $menu.id = $a.data[0] $value = $a.data[1]
if $menu.id == 'cmd.menu.upgradefac' $settings = get global variable: name='cmd.settings' $settings['search'] = $value gosub sub.BuildMenu return $menu end
else if $a.event == [MEvent.Switch] $menu.id = $a.data[0] $selection = $a.data[1] $value = $a.data[2] if $menu.id == 'cmd.menu.upgradefac' $settings = get global variable: name='cmd.settings' $settings[$selection] = $value gosub sub.BuildMenu return $menu else if $menu.id == 'menu.select.upgrade' $global.settings[$selection] = $value gosub sub.BuildSelectMenu return $menu end
else if $a.event == [MEvent.Returned] $menu.id = $a.data[0] $selection = $a.data[1] $value = $a.data[2]
if $menu.id == 'menu.select.upgrade' if not is datatype[ $value ] == DATATYPE_NULL if $selection == 'select.sector' $a.obj ->set local variable: name='cmd.upgrade' value=$value return [TRUE] else if $selection == 'select.fac' $a.obj ->set local variable: name='cmd.upgrade' value=$value return [TRUE] else if $selection == 'cmd.menu.upgradefac' if is datatype[ $value ] == DATATYPE_ARRAY $v = $value[0] if $v == 'start' $table = table alloc $settings = get global variable: name='cmd.settings' $key = get next key: table=$settings key=null while $key $v = $settings[$key] if $key -> is of class Complex Hub if $v $aFacs = $key ->get factories connected to complex if $aFacs $i = size of array $aFacs while $i dec $i = $fac = $aFacs[$i] if $v == 1 do if $settings[$fac] $table[$fac] = [TRUE] else if $v == 2 $table[$fac] = [TRUE] end end end end else if not $key ->get complex hangar do if $v $table[$key] = [TRUE] end $key = get next key: table=$settings key=$key end $a.obj ->set local variable: name='cmd.upgrade' value=$table return [TRUE] end end end end end
else if $a.event == [MEvent.Cancelled] if $a.data == 'cmd.menu.upgradefac' OR $a.data == 'select.fac' OR $a.data == 'select.sector' gosub sub.BuildSelectMenu return $input end
else if $a.event == [MEvent.Arguments] $ret = $a.obj -> get local variable: name='cmd.upgrade' $fave = $global.settings['fave'] $ret = create new array, size=2, elements=$ret, $fave, null, null, null, null, null, null return $ret
else if $a.event == [MEvent.Finished] $a.obj ->set local variable: name='cmd.upgrade' value=null set global variable: name='cmd.settings' value=null end
return null
sub.GetSector: $read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=28 $input = create input: id='select.sector', user input=Var/Sector, refobj=$a.obj, description=$read.text, without sector=[FALSE], filterclass=null, racemask=null, flags=null, default=null endsub
sub.GetFactory: $read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=29 $filter = create new array, arguments=Factory, null, null, null, null $input = create input: id='select.fac', user input=Var/Station owned by Player, refobj=$a.obj, description=$read.text, without sector=[FALSE], filterclass=$filter, racemask=null, flags=null, default=null endsub
sub.BuildSelectMenu: $menu = create custom menu array $read.text = get command info: command=COMMAND_UPGRADE_FACTORY add custom menu info line to array $menu: text=$read.text
$aValues = array alloc: size=2 $read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=38 $aValues[0] = $read.text $read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=39 $aValues[1] = $read.text
$default = $global.settings['fave'] $read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=37 add value selection to menu: $menu, text=$read.text, value array=$aValues, default=$default, return id='fave', width=100 allowtabs=[FALSE] add section to custom menu: $menu
$read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=30 add custom menu item to array $menu: text=$read.text nextinput='single' value=null $read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=31 add custom menu item to array $menu: text=$read.text nextinput='sector' value=null $read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=32 add custom menu item to array $menu: text=$read.text nextinput='all' value=null
set menu option: $menu, icon=113
$text = get command name: command=COMMAND_UPGRADE_FACTORY $input = create input: id='menu.select.upgrade' menu=$menu title=$text description=$a.obj callback=[Callback.Switch] endsub
sub.BuildMenu: $settings = get global variable: name='cmd.settings' $search.str = $settings['search']
$menu = create custom menu array
set menu option: $menu, widthtype=[MenuWidth.Big]
$aFacs = get station array: of race Player class/type=Factory $count.done = 0
if not $aFacs $read.text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=689 add non selectable menu item: $menu, text=$read.text else if not size of array $aFacs $read.text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=689 add non selectable menu item: $menu, text=$read.text else $aFacs = sort array $aFacs $i = 0 $size = size of array $aFacs
$aValues = array alloc: size=2 $read.text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=1102302 $aValues[0] = $read.text $read.text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=1102301 $aValues[1] = $read.text $aComplexValues = array alloc: size=3 $read.text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=1102302 $aComplexValues[0] = $read.text $read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=33 $aComplexValues[1] = $read.text $read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=34 $aComplexValues[2] = $read.text
$count = 0
while $i < $size $f = $aFacs[$i] inc $i = do if $f ->get complex hangar continue
if $search.str $text = $f -> get name skip if case insensitive string match, is $search.str in $text continue end
$tab = 0 $obj = $f
if $f -> is of class Complex Hub $display = [FALSE] gosub sub.DisplayFac add value selection to menu: $menu, text=$text.cols, value array=$aComplexValues, default=$default, return id=$f, width=60 allowtabs=[FALSE] inc $count.done =
if $default == 1 $aComplexFacs = $f ->get factories connected to complex if $aComplexFacs if size of array $aComplexFacs $display = [TRUE] $tab = 20 $aComplexFacs = sort array $aComplexFacs $j = 0 $j.size = size of array $aComplexFacs while $j < $j.size $obj = $aComplexFacs[$j] inc $j = gosub sub.DisplayFac do if $default inc $count = end add section to custom menu: $menu end end else if $default == 2 $aComplexFacs = $f ->get factories connected to complex if $aComplexFacs $c = size of array $aComplexFacs do if $c $count = $count + $c end end else $display = [TRUE] gosub sub.DisplayFac do if $default inc $count = end end
add section to custom menu: $menu $text = convert number $count to string $read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=35 $text = sprintf: fmt='[%s: %s]', $read.text, $text, null, null, null $read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=36 $text.cols = create text for custom menu, left=$read.text, right=$text if $count <= 0 set menu line option: $menu, selection colour=[MenuColour.Disabled] $ret = create menu return value: disabled, id='start' add custom menu item to array $menu: text=$text.cols returnvalue=$ret else add custom menu item to array $menu: text=$text.cols returnvalue='start' end end
$read.text = get command info: command=COMMAND_UPGRADE_FACTORY add custom menu info line to array $menu: text=$read.text
set menu option: $menu, allow searching=[TRUE] set menu option: $menu, icon=113
$text = get command name: command=COMMAND_UPGRADE_FACTORY $input = create input: id='cmd.menu.upgradefac' menu=$menu title=$text description=$a.obj callback=[Callback.Switch] endsub
sub.DisplayFac: $text.cols = array alloc: size=3 $text = $obj ->create custom menu string object icon $text = create custom menu column string, position=$tab length=10 right=[FALSE] colour=null text=$text $text.cols[0] = $text $text = $obj -> get name $pos = 10 + $tab $len = 250 - $tab $text = create custom menu column string, position=$pos length=$len right=[FALSE] colour=null text=$text $text.cols[1] = $text $text = $obj -> get sector $text = create custom menu column string, position=260 length=0 right=[FALSE] colour=null text=$text $text.cols[2] = $text
$default = $settings[$obj] skip if $default $default = 0
if $display add value selection to menu: $menu, text=$text.cols, value array=$aValues, default=$default, return id=$obj, width=60 allowtabs=[FALSE] inc $count.done = end endsub
return null

line.text: add custom menu info line to array
add custom menu item to array
add custom menu item to array
add custom menu item to array
create text for custom menu, left=
create menu return value: disabled, id=
add custom menu item to array
add custom menu item to array
add custom menu info line to array
create custom menu string object icon
create custom menu column string, position=
create custom menu column string, position=
create custom menu column string, position=

sval.val: Patch, Ship Command - Upgrade Factories - Meneu Event Script
